      • run

        public java.lang.String run(boolean gui)
        Main run method, runs every step/tick.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • goToShop

        public void goToShop(Customer c,
                     int i)
        Send the customer to the store
        Parameters:
        c - Customer Class
        i - Integer is 0 normally, but may be 1 if the customer goes straight to the till (motorbikes and unhappy customers)

      • getConfig

        Get the current configuration
        Returns:

      • spawnVehicle

        private boolean spawnVehicle()
        Creates one random subclass of the vehicle class, based on probabilities in config.
        Returns:
        true if the number is equivalent to the probablities or false if its greater.
